channel.title: Unfixable?
channel.description: ive got basically an almost unfixable peice of code if you wanna try to fix it reply below or pm me and ill let you on teamviewer it has too do with opening mystery/reward boxes thanks

item.title: Unfixable?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“danike, post:9, topic:407159”]i get 100 errors when i move the code from client.java to potions.java would you like too see on teamviewer
can you dumb that down a bit im moving as fast as i can but im litterally brand new too coding[/quote]Sigh, this is literaly the last time im going to attempt to help you. im assuming you use delta seeing as you have potions.java, go to the very top of potions.java and type import client; or Client if its capitilized.

Read full topic

item.title: Unfixable?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“danike, post:7, topic:407159”]you cant do that when you move either codes you get 100 errors[/quote]What ae you talking about? 100 errors only apllies to missing brackets? you need to import the file in which the randomPartyHat method is. to do this go to the very top of the file and type import packaging.filename; packaging being the file directory filename being the filename. im done spoon feeding you.

Read full topic

item.title: Unfixable?
item.dc:creator: @danike danike
item.description:
@danike wrote:

you cant do that when you move either codes you get 100 errors
edit:

public int randomPartyHat() { int[] hats = {1038, 1040, 1042, 1044, 1046, 1048}; return hats[new Random().nextInt(hats.length)]; }
thats in client.java
the other codes in potions.java move either and it doesnt work

Read full topic

item.title: Unfixable?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“danike, post:5, topic:407159”]potions.java:58: cannot find symbol
symbol : method randomPartyHat()
location: class potions
c.addItem(randomPartyHat(), 1);
^
1 error[/quote]You have not defined the randomPartyHat method, if its defined in a different file your going to need to import it.

Read full topic
